name: Bara Adventure
description:
Introduction

LGBT+ oriented game. Play as Hiro, an average guy working as a barista whose life takes an unexpected turn that takes him to a fantasy land where he meets very attractive hunks that help him in his unimaginable destiny.

Help the men of Aevanium to defeat the demon Dangrazel and their minions and save their kingdom from doom while you have fun with them.

This game was developed for Bara Jam 2019, a jam focuses on male same-sex love usually created by gay men for a gay male audience.

NOTE: This game contains explicit content and sexual material, play it under your discretion.

Controls

Use arrow keys to move.

Press “Space” or “Enter” keys to interact with people and objects.

Press “Shift” key while pressing arrow keys to move.

Press “Esc” to open the menu.

Press "Alt+Enter" to switch between full screen and windowed mode. 

You can also use a Gamepad to play.
